verses.verse: בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> On that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> they נִקְרָ֛א <S%H7121><s%> they read בְּסֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses בְּאָזְנֵ֣י <S%H241><s%> in the audience הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְנִמְצָא֙ <S%H4672><s%> and therein was found כָּת֣וּב <S%H3789><s%> written בּ֔וֹ אֲ֠שֶׁר <S%H834><s%> ti לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָב֨וֹא <S%H935><s%> should not come עַמֹּנִ֧י <S%H5984><s%> that the Ammonite וּמֹאָבִ֛י <S%H4125><s%> and the Moabite בִּקְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> into the congregation הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> of God עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> did not קִדְּמ֛וּ <S%H6923><s%> Because they met אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> not the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּלֶּ֣חֶם <S%H3899><s%> with bread וּבַמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> and with water וַיִּשְׂכֹּ֨ר <S%H7936><s%> but hired עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְעָם֙ <S%H1109><s%> Balaam לְקַֽלְל֔וֹ <S%H7043><s%> against them that he should curse וַיַּהֲפֹ֧ךְ <S%H2015><s%> turned אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <S%H430><s%> them howbeit our God הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> the curse לִבְרָכָֽה׃ <S%H1293><s%> into a blessing

וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּשָׁמְעָ֣ם <S%H8085><s%> Now it came to pass when they had heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> the law וַיַּבְדִּ֥ילוּ <S%H914><s%> that they separated כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֖רֶב <S%H6154><s%> all the mixed multitude מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> from Israel

וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> And before מִזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> to this אֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <S%H475><s%> this Eliashib הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest נָת֖וּן <S%H5414><s%> having the oversight בְּלִשְׁכַּ֣ת <S%H3957><s%> of the chamber בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God קָר֖וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [was] allied לְטוֹבִיָּֽה׃ <S%H2900><s%> unto Tobiah

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he had prepared ל֜וֹ לִשְׁכָּ֣ה <S%H3957><s%> chamber גְדוֹלָ֗ה <S%H1419><s%> for him a great וְשָׁ֣ם <S%H8033><s%> where הָי֪וּ <S%H1961><s%> become לְפָנִ֟ים <S%H6440><s%> where aforetime נֹ֠תְנִים <S%H5414><s%> they laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֨ה <S%H4503><s%> the meat offerings הַלְּבוֹנָ֜ה <S%H3828><s%> the frankincense וְהַכֵּלִ֗ים <S%H3627><s%> and the vessels וּמַעְשַׂ֤ר <S%H4643><s%> and the tithes הַדָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> of the corn הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> the new wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> and the oil מִצְוַת֙ <S%H4687><s%> which was commanded הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> [to be given] to the Levites וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <S%H7891><s%> and the singers וְהַשֹּׁעֲרִ֑ים <S%H7778><s%> and the porters וּתְרוּמַ֖ת <S%H8641><s%> and the offerings הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> of the priests

וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֕ה <S%H2088><s%> this לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הָיִ֖יתִי <S%H1961><s%> become בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> But in all this [time] was not I at Jerusalem כִּ֡י <S%H3588><s%> for בִּשְׁנַת֩ <S%H8141><s%> year שְׁלֹשִׁ֨ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirtieth וּשְׁתַּ֜יִם <S%H8147><s%> for in the two לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֤סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> of Artaxerxes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon בָּ֣אתִי <S%H935><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> I unto the king וּלְקֵ֥ץ <S%H7093><s%> and after יָמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> certain days נִשְׁאַ֥לְתִּי <S%H7592><s%> obtained I leave מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> of the king

וָאָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> And I came לִֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem וָאָבִ֣ינָה <S%H995><s%> and understood בָרָעָ֗ה <S%H7451><s%> of the evil אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> did אֶלְיָשִׁיב֙ <S%H475><s%> that Eliashib לְט֣וֹבִיָּ֔ה <S%H2900><s%> for Tobiah לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> in preparing לוֹ֙ נִשְׁכָּ֔ה <S%H5393><s%> him a chamber בְּחַצְרֵ֖י <S%H2691><s%> in the courts בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיֵּ֥רַֽע <S%H7489><s%> displeasing לִ֖י מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me sore וָֽאַשְׁלִ֜יכָה <S%H7993><s%> therefore I cast forth אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כְּלֵ֧י <S%H3627><s%> stuff בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> all the household טוֹבִיָּ֛ה <S%H2900><s%> of Tobiah הַח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> out of מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַלִּשְׁכָּֽה׃ <S%H3957><s%> the chamber

וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> Then I commanded וַֽיְטַהֲר֖וּ <S%H2891><s%> and they cleansed הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <S%H3957><s%> the chambers וָאָשִׁ֣יבָה <S%H7725><s%> and thither brought I again שָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there כְּלֵי֙ <S%H3627><s%> the vessels בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> with the meat offering וְהַלְּבוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3828><s%> and the frankincense פ

וָאֵ֣דְעָ֔ה <S%H3045><s%> And I perceived כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that מְנָי֥וֹת <S%H4521><s%> that the portions הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> had not נִתָּ֑נָה <S%H5414><s%> had not been given וַיִּבְרְח֧וּ <S%H1272><s%> were fled אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> every one לְשָׂדֵ֛הוּ <S%H7704><s%> to his field הַלְוִיִּ֥ם <S%H3881><s%> [them] for the Levites וְהַמְשֹׁרְרִ֖ים <S%H7891><s%> and the singers עֹשֵׂ֥י <S%H6213><s%> that did הַמְּלָאכָֽה׃ <S%H4399><s%> the work

וָאָרִ֙יבָה֙ <S%H7378><s%> Then contended אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הַסְּגָנִ֔ים <S%H5461><s%> I with the rulers וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> and said מַדּ֖וּעַ <S%H4069><s%> Why נֶעֱזַ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> forsaken בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> Why is the house הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וָֽאֶ֨קְבְּצֵ֔ם <S%H6908><s%> ? And I gathered them together וָֽאַעֲמִדֵ֖ם <S%H5975><s%> and set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and עָמְדָֽם׃ <S%H5977><s%> them in their place

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> all Judah הֵבִ֜יאוּ <S%H935><s%> Then brought מַעְשַׂ֧ר <S%H4643><s%> the tithe הַדָּגָ֛ן <S%H1715><s%> of the corn וְהַתִּיר֥וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> and the new wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֖ר <S%H3323><s%> and the oil לָאוֹצָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H214><s%> unto the treasuries

וָאוֹצְרָ֣ה <S%H686><s%> And I made treasurers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> charge א֠וֹצָרוֹת <S%H214><s%> over the treasuries שֶׁלֶמְיָ֨ה <S%H8018><s%> Shelemiah הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְצָד֣וֹק <S%H6659><s%> and Zadok הַסּוֹפֵ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> the scribe וּפְדָיָה֙ <S%H6305><s%> Pedaiah מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> and of the Levites וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and it was their task יָדָ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> and next to them חָנָ֥ן <S%H2605><s%> [was] Hanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son זַכּ֖וּר <S%H2139><s%> of Zaccur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מַתַּנְיָ֑ה <S%H4983><s%> of Mattaniah כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נֶאֱמָנִים֙ <S%H539><s%> faithful נֶחְשָׁ֔בוּ <S%H2803><s%> for they were counted וַעֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> charge לַחֲלֹ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> and their office [was] to distribute לַאֲחֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> unto their brethren פ

זָכְרָה־ <S%H2142><s%> Remember לִּ֥י אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> me O my God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> and do וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֶּ֣מַח <S%H4229><s%> concerning this and wipe not out חֲסָדַ֗י <S%H2617><s%> my good אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשִׂ֛יתִי <S%H6213><s%> deeds that I have done בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> for the house אֱלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> of my God וּבְמִשְׁמָרָֽיו׃ <S%H4929><s%> and for the offices

בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> In those days הָהֵ֡מָּה <S%H1992><s%> those רָאִ֣יתִי <S%H7200><s%> saw בִֽיהוּדָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3063><s%> I in Judah דֹּֽרְכִֽים־ <S%H1869><s%> [some] treading גִּתּ֣וֹת ׀ <S%H1660><s%> wine presses בַּשַּׁבָּ֡ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וּמְבִיאִ֣ים <S%H935><s%> and bringing in הָעֲרֵמ֣וֹת <S%H6194><s%> sheaves וְֽעֹמְסִ֪ים <S%H6006><s%> and lading עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַחֲמֹרִ֟ים <S%H2543><s%> asses וְאַף־ <S%H637><s%> well יַ֜יִן <S%H3196><s%> as also wine עֲנָבִ֤ים <S%H6025><s%> grapes וּתְאֵנִים֙ <S%H8384><s%> and figs וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַשָּׂ֔א <S%H4853><s%> and all [manner of] burdens וּמְבִיאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> which they brought יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> into Jerusalem בְּי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath וָאָעִ֕יד <S%H5749><s%> and I testified בְּי֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [against them] in the day מִכְרָ֥ם <S%H4376><s%> wherein they sold צָֽיִד׃ <S%H6718><s%> victuals

וְהַצֹּרִים֙ <S%H6876><s%> men of Tyre יָ֣שְׁבוּ <S%H3427><s%> There dwelt בָ֔הּ מְבִיאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> also therein which brought דָּ֖אג <S%H1709><s%> fish וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מֶ֑כֶר <S%H4377><s%> and all manner of ware וּמֹכְרִ֧ים <S%H4376><s%> and sold בַּשַּׁבָּ֛ת <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> and in Jerusalem

וָאָרִ֕יבָה <S%H7378><s%> Then I contended אֵ֖ת <S%H854><s%> for חֹרֵ֣י <S%H2715><s%> with the nobles יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֗ם מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What הַדָּבָ֨ר <S%H1697><s%> thing הָרָ֤ע <S%H7451><s%> unto them What evil הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you עֹשִׂ֔ים <S%H6213><s%> [is] this that ye do וּֽמְחַלְּלִ֖ים <S%H2490><s%> and profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> age הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath

הֲל֨וֹא <S%H3808><s%> not כֹ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> the same עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> Did אֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> not your fathers וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> bring אֱלֹהֵ֜ינוּ <S%H430><s%> not our God עָלֵ֗ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרָעָ֣ה <S%H7451><s%> all this evil הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and הָעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> city הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> you מוֹסִיפִ֤ים <S%H935><s%> brought חָרוֹן֙ <S%H2740><s%> wrath עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> upon Israel לְחַלֵּ֖ל <S%H2490><s%> by profaning אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath פ

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> it צָֽלֲלוּ֩ <S%H6751><s%> began to be dark שַׁעֲרֵ֨י <S%H8179><s%> And it came to pass that when the gates יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath וָאֹֽמְרָה֙ <S%H559><s%> I commanded וַיִּסָּגְר֣וּ <S%H5462><s%> should be shut הַדְּלָת֔וֹת <S%H1817><s%> that the gates וָאֹ֣מְרָ֔ה <S%H559><s%> and charged אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> that לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יִפְתָּח֔וּם <S%H6605><s%> that they should not be opened עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> till after הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> the sabbath וּמִנְּעָרַ֗י <S%H5288><s%> and [some] of my servants הֶֽעֱמַ֙דְתִּי֙ <S%H5975><s%> set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at הַשְּׁעָרִ֔ים <S%H8179><s%> I at the gates לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> be brought in מַשָּׂ֖א <S%H4853><s%> [that] there should no burden בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> on the sabbath
